share-cois-with-holders.text: When a Certificate of Insurance has an identifield holder, share it with the associated trading partners.

share-certificates.text: When a FSQA Certificate has an identifield facility location, share it with the associated trading partners.

share-audits.text: When a FSQA Audit has an identifield facility location, share it with the associated trading partners.

share-logs.text: When a Letter of Guarantee has an identifield buyer, share it with the associated trading partners.
